definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: The Indians know full well that China expects obedience from its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 印度人清楚地知道，中國希望其鄰國乖乖地服從領導。

sentences.english: She is an obedient girl and always obeys her parents.
sentences.chinese: 她是個順從的孩子，總是服從父母。

sentences.english: The discipline of legionaries is absolute.
sentences.chinese: 紀律保證了軍團士兵的絕對服從。

sentences.english: Spurgeon saw this and faithfully obeyed.
sentences.chinese: 司布真看到這點，他忠心地服從。

sentences.english: She expects me to bow down to her and do everything she tells me.
sentences.chinese: 她期待我服從她，做她所告訴我的一切事情。

sentences.english: Subordination and silence best became their years and capacity.
sentences.chinese: 服從與沉默，最適合他們的年令與能力。

sentences.english: All the crew must submit to the shipmaster's aforementioned decisions unconditionally.
sentences.chinese: 所有船員必須無條件地服從船長做出的上述決定。

sentences.english: He that cannot obey, cannot command.
sentences.chinese: 不能服從的人，就不能指揮。

sentences.english: Demand follows a non-homogeneous Poisson process at each price level.
sentences.chinese: 在每個價格水平下，需求服從非齊次泊松分佈。

sentences.english: Does this mean Fido is into dominance and submission?
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着大黃所作所爲是統治與服從的表現麼？

sentences.english: The legionaries, on their victorious return, refused any longer to obey the consuls.
sentences.chinese: 軍團士兵在凱旋歸國時，不肯服從執政官的命令。

sentences.english: I obeyed her summons, and accompanied her out.
sentences.chinese: 我服從了她的召喚，陪她出去了。

sentences.english: Likewise you also have those who hold to the teaching of the Nicolaitans.
sentences.chinese: 你那裏也有人照樣服從了尼哥拉一黨人的教訓。

sentences.english: He refused to obey the court order and was sent to prison for contempt.
sentences.chinese: 他拒絕服從法院命令，因藐視法庭而被收監。

sentences.english: The functional departments are responsible to coordinate the audit team and follow its assignment.
sentences.chinese: 各職能部門負責配合審覈小組開展工作，服從其安排。

definition: to listen and obey/to comply with/to heed/to hearken
to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
